fields.headline: Worcestershire
fields.bodyText:  Slopperton farm abbatoir, near Chippenham.  Windybank sheep and cattle farm in Redditch.  Happy Bank Farm cattle and sheep farm in Bromsgrove.  The Woodlands sheep and cattle farm in Chaddesley Corbett,near Kidderminster.  The Grove sheep farm at Brockhampton.  Home Farm and Brockhall in Bringsty, affecting sheep and cattle.  Grove Farm sheep and cattle farm in Pershore.  Home Farm sheep farm in Besford. The Woodlands cattle and sheep farm in Kidderminster.  Sparum Farm, Kidderminster  Blindfields Farm, Ombersley  Astwood Farm, Redditch  Brockencote House, Chaddesley Corbett, Kidderminster  Bradford House, Chaddesley Corbett, Kidderminster  East Field Farm, Butts Lane, Stone, Kidderminster  Glebes Farm, Stone, Kidderminster  Field opposite, Brockencote Hotel, Chaddesley Corbett, Kidderminster  Woodlane Farm, Woodlane, Sirfield, Bromsgrove  Brodrick Cummins Farm, Hindlip, Worcester  Ravenshill Farm, Tibberton, Droitwich  Evelench Farm, Tibberton, Droitwich Milk Barn, Breddon, Hardwicke, Tewkesbury  Saldons Farm, Himbleton, Droitwich  Stonehall Farm, Kempsey Common, Kempsey Nationwide list of cases | Anglesey | Berkshire | Cheshire | Cleveland | Cornwall | County Durham | Cumbria | Derbyshire | Devon | Dumfries and Galloway | Essex | Gloucestershire and Bristol | Gwent | Herefordshire | Kent | Lancashire | Leicestershire | Monmouthshire | Northern Ireland | Northamptonshire | Northumberland | North Yorkshire | Oxfordshire | Powys | Scottish Borders | Shropshire | Somerset | Staffordshire | Warwickshire | West Midlands | West Yorkshire | Wiltshire | Worcestershire
